text: Friends () is a 1938 Soviet movie directed by Lev Arnshtam.Проклятие Чапая The movie is based on the life of Sergey Kirov. During the Russian Civil War, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union sends Aleksey to Caucasus Mountains to help organize an armed uprising. It stars Boris Babochkin, Irina Zarubina, and Nikolai Cherkasov. ==Actors== * Boris Babochkin - Aleksey * Irina Zarubina * Nikolai Cherkasov - Beta, an Ossetian * Stepan Kayukov * Kote Daushvili == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1938 movies Category:Movies directed by Lev Arnshtam
title: Friends (1938 movie)
